General.Name: Li Peng Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Li Peng Enterprise Co., Ltd. engages in manufacture and sale of fibers and yarns in Asia and internationally. The company provides nylon chips, nylon filament yarns, and dyed yarns. It also offers various synthetic fabrics; plain woven and knitted fabrics; various textile products; and raw materials. In addition, it is involved in reinvestment; and renewable energy, self- powered generation equipment, and cogeneration industry. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
